grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 融合【ユウゴウ】agglutination, adhesion, fusion, combination, blending, uniting
炉心溶融【ロシンヨウユウ】core meltdown, meltdown, nuclear reactor core meltdown
kun reading compounds: 溶ける【とける】to melt, to thaw, to fuse, to dissolve
溶かす【とかす】to dissolve, to melt
